data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the African genus Greenwayodendron (Annonaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lissambou, Brandet-Junior, Hardy, Olivier J., Atteke, Christiane, Stevart, Tariq, Dauby, Gilles, Mbatchi, Bertrand, Sonke, Bonaventure, Couvreur, Thomas L. P. (2018): Taxonomic revision of the African genus Greenwayodendron (Annonaceae). PhytoKeys 114: 55-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.114.27395, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.114.27395
